get.description:
GetUnitTypes is an endpoint that responds to a collection of information for types of units in a facility, such as the type of storage, width, length and height of the unit. 

These information are passed through the siteId, which can be viewed in SiteId models located in (https://quikstor.stoplight.io/docs/quikstor-thirdparty-access/reference/ThirdParty.v1.json/components/schemas/SiteId), and the identifier (id) will return the information.

Authorization.description: Header values to be bearer token in a format "bearer access-token"

get.description: Ability to access an array of available unit types for each facility.
